Text.Name: The connection to the SageTV Server has been lost. Attempting to restore the connection...
The connection to the SageTV Service has been lost. The connection will be reestablished once the SageTV service restarts.

InfoText = "Used Video Diskspace: " + If(UsedVideoDiskspace == -1, "Calculating...", NumberFormat("0.00", UsedVideoDiskspace / 1.0E9) + " GB")
InfoText = "Used Library Diskspace: " + If(UsedLibraryDiskspace == -1, "Calculating...", NumberFormat("0.00", UsedLibraryDiskspace / 1.0E9) + " GB")
InfoText = "System Configuration Details" + If(ItemsToBeUpdated>0, " (Updating " + ItemsToBeUpdated + " items)", "")

InfoText = "Sync System Clock with SageTV Server: " + If( IsSyncSystemClockWithServerEnabled(), "Enabled", "Disabled" )
InfoText = "Show Mouse Icons: " + If( GetProperty("show_mouse_icons", true), "Enabled", "Disabled" )
"REM List all Aspect Ratio Mode Settings"
